Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: In Holy Cross, I came to like school, to like studying in a way I had never done before

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: Apartheid either is or is not. And it must not be

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: We all belong to South Africa, and South Africa belongs to us all

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: In South Africa, I feel I am a stranger, at best an animal

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: It was always my desire to strike new ground and help to lend weight where it was most required

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: To go back means defeat

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: The more pressure you bring from without, the less internal pressure is necessary

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: Apartheid is inherently a practice of violence

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Every idea is an incitement... eloquence may set fire to reason

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware how you take away hope from another human being

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The mode by which the inevitable comes to pass is effort

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: When in doubt, do it

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: People talk fundamentals and superlatives and then make some changes of detail

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Men must turn square corners when they deal with the Government

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Certitude is not the test of certainty. We have been cocksure of many things that were not so

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: But friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The young man knows the rules, but the old man knows the exceptions

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The Amen of nature is always a flower

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Speak clearly, if you speak at all; carve every word before you let it fall

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the province of knowledge to speak, and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A moment's insight is sometimes worth a life's experience

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Love prefers twilight to daylight

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people are so heavenly minded that they are no earthly good

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind of a bigot to the pupil of the eye; the more light you pour on it, the more it contracts

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like the bullying, do-one-over style of comedy. It's so cheap

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just an actor - all I do is I memorise someone else's words and tart around

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have done Botox, and I loved it

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I always assumed I'd be a terribly patient mum but it turns out I'm not!

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is playing, and it is like being a big kid. Yeah, it's great. You get paid

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't bear kissing scenes

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually, lots of women, when they're pregnant, feel like steel. They feel incredible

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always keen to have more training as a charity patron

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I remember being held by my mum as a baby

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been with my husband and friends for so long, I've forgotten what is unappealing to new people

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to have coffee in the morning

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: Ryan Gosling's, like, my crush, but I don't really pay attention to his personal style

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: Heartbreak is hard, but you find more and more things to be grateful for every day

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no ideal body. It's just taking what you have and working it

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: Well I love preppy style; I like J. Crew for guys

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a real girly-girl

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: I was taught to value hard work. At the end of day, I'm just Olivia

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a gentleman. Someone with manners

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: Pineapple reduces swelling

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day is a blessing

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a big fan of Super Troopers, so working with the Broken Lizard guys was so much fun

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I want you to like me, but I don't care if you don't

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think something's funny, go with that. Most comedians pull jokes from a place of honesty

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: Basically, I'm living the life of an actress in L.A. And I've recently had some pretty good fortune

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really sarcastic. Not Morgan Webb sarcastic. She's dry, 100%. I'm different from her

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I literally hate working out

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: If you stand up for women, then don't bash me

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I never tried to use anything besides my own sweat and blood and talent to get somewhere

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm easy to hate. I get it

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in a military family, so by the time I was 13 I'd lived in six different places

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - My memories are inside me - they're not things or a place - I can take them anywhere

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - I'm happy, and I think being happy keeps you looking young

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - To me luxury is to be at home with my daughter, and the occasional massage doesn't hurt

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - I love life and nothing intimidates me anymore

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - I don't know what my path is yet. I'm just walking on it

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - I'm so happy with 'Grease' and 'Xanadu,' particularly because of the music in both films

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - Being in love is the best thing in my life

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - I live every day to its fullest extent and I don't sweat the small stuff

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - Family, nature and health all go together

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - I love that quiet time when nobody's up and the animals are all happy to see me

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the really young are fearless, have the optimism, the romanticism to take unimaginable risks

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: I think what ruins relationships and causes most fights is insecurity

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: If you fall off a horse, you get back up. I am not a quitter

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to experiment all the time with my hair color

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm left high and dry at the end of this wild journey, just taking it is a great feeling

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh God, to think that you only fall in love once in your entire life is such a depressing thought

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: I love yoga and hiking - I think that's the perfect combo

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Not everything has to be a couples' event

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: At one point I thought changing my name might help with privacy, but that was before the Internet

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a handful growing up

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to have some distance with your family. As long as you're closer to them by love

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a movie star like other actors in the way that I need to walk with a bodyguard

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to dig in the truth all of the time. Let me dream

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagination creates some big monsters

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: It's like all the signs were telling me that I shouldn't be a boxer, so I quit

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: People sometimes recognize me here, but they are very nice

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is based on imagination

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always be a foreigner

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to be happy, live discreetly. Does that make sense in English?

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: I never analyze why I was with one woman instead of another

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: Our eyes reflect light. Better that the lips are more like a rose petal

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: I could live naked... I love it

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: My sense of designing is a mix of intuition and intellectual control

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a designer that buys vintage to be inspired

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: What is sure is that the satellite view of our world and its evolution is now a common reality

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: I really hated school. I had the feeling I was losing a lot of time

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of obsessed with cool girls

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: In fashion, we don't often know the prices. We don't have time to go into the stores

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't understand the advantages of staying active until I was about 27

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: I rarely stay at home when I'm in New York. I'm always doing things. It brings you so much energy

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: The first bit of vinyl I bought was Michael Jackson's 'Bad.'

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: To be the most successful male from 'The X Factor' is a big achievement, and I'm chuffed with that

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I lost 'The X Factor,' and I lost 'Deal or No Deal' twice. I'm good at losing game shows

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it frustrating when people wear belts with braces. That's an interesting one

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just an instant flirt with most people. I'm very cheeky

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a keen runner, so I try to fit in a half hour every other day

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to be in a boy band since I was a kid

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't like my fans going through my rubbish

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really do sad, depressing songs

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to meet the right girl and have a family. I'm very broody

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not every day you get to do what you love and have a major story behind it

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to stay focused

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: I love hats. On tour, it's difficult to stop in at a barber. It's good to have a hat nearby

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about metaphors is that, if you give them away, you give away the mystery

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: My stage name is actually my nickname given to me by my dad when I was a baby

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a dancehall artist, and I am not a reggae artist

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never hidden the fact that I'm Jamaican; I will never disown my roots or influences

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an appreciation for everywhere I've been so far

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: Fan reactions are crazy sometimes

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: The quality of a timeless song is that it's catchy, meaningful and relatable

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: You can either see yourself as a wave in the ocean or you can see yourself as the ocean

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I still have my feet on the ground, I just wear better shoes

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Turn your wounds into wisdom

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of heaven is a great big baked potato and someone to share it with

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is short, and we should respect every moment of it

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I see Turkey's future as being in Europe, as one of many prosperous, tolerant, democratic countries

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: The opponents of this process have always tried to vilify westernization as a poor imitation

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a fiction writer makes you someone who works with irresponsibility

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: We fall in love more deeply when we're unhappy

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I write a world where everyone is partly right

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: When I paint, I definitely live in the present, like someone in a shower whistling or singing

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I always enjoy impersonating my characters in the first-person singular

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I think less than people think I do about politics. I care about writing

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't want to portray the Islamists as simply evil, the way it's often done in the west

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot work and be at home with your child. But you want both

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't hide. I never have. I stay at home because I like to stay at home, and at home I work

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: I am disgusted by the anti-Semitism of many Italians, of many Europeans

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a danger to myself if I get angry

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: Heroes can be sweet

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: Glory is a heavy burden, a murdering poison, and to bear it is an art. And to have that art is rare

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: I have expressed my opinion through the written word through my books, that is all

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: It must be terribly lonely to be a king instead of a man

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I am a writer; it is the only thing I am sure of

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: The most humiliating thing a woman can be is a coquette

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: The golden rule for every business man is this: 'Put yourself in your customer's place.'

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: Our trials, our sorrows, and our grieves develop us

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: A will finds a way

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: Put the uncommon effort into the common task... make it large by doing it in a great way

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: It is what we do easily and what we like to do that we do well

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: The hand cannot reach higher than does the heart

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: The influential man is the successful man, whether he be rich or poor

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: It is like the seed put in the soil - the more one sows, the greater the harvest

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a gentleman is a worthy goal

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to have a nice, happy life

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to look stylish on a budget is to try second-hand, bargain hunting, and vintage

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: Sofia Coppola is wonderful, and I'd love to work with her

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: People think getting a new partner is like getting a new car

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: Having people jumping in front of you taking a photo can be unnerving

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever happens in life is fine - just trust in that

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: Elves are cool, man

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a hopeless romantic and I love to spoil my girlfriends

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still at the beginning of my career. It's all a little new, and I'm still learning as I go

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: Metaphors have a way of holding the most truth in the least space

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as you keep getting born, it's alright to die some times

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope I am remembered by my children as a good father

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: Among my most prized possessions are words that I have never spoken

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: You who speak languages, you are such liars

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe that there are aliens. I believe there are really different people

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: The lies we live will always be confessed in the stories that we tell

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: Working is hard and distracts from having fun

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: One mind can think only of its own questions; it rarely surprises itself

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: Create your own visual style... let it be unique for yourself and yet identifiable for others

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody gets justice. People only get good luck or bad luck

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want a happy ending, that depends, of course, on where you stop your story

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an unfortunate personality

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent most of my mature life trying to prove that I'm not irresponsible

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: The enemy of art is the absence of limitations

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't say we all ought to misbehave, but we ought to look as if we could

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody who takes on anything big and tough can afford to be modest

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are down and out something always turns up - and it is usually the noses of your friends

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: The qualities I most admire in women are confidence and kindness

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: Gardening is how I relax. It's another form of creating and playing with colors

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: I like light, color, luminosity. I like things full of color and vibrant

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: I always say: To be well dressed you must be well naked

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really know how to do casual clothes

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: The great thing about fashion is that it always looks forward

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: Every season I am inspired by women

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: Online media is increasingly influential in fashion

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted this, I wanted to do this, but my work is me, and it has to be right

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Mojave' is a very wild, throwback film with these two dudes going after each other

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being like a chameleon who transforms himself with each role

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Cool' is detached and emotionally cool. My instinct is to battle anything that seems overly cool

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't try to be authentic. You either are or you aren't

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: J. J. Abrams is amazing

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: I get attached to things: I wear the same jeans for a year

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, with a character, you start with the shoes

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: With Shakespeare, there's no subtext; you're speaking exactly what you're thinking constantly

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess 'Scarface' was the Cuban Al Pacino

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: If you start trying to communicate ideas, I think you don't allow the audience to see themselves

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm schizophrenic, and so am I

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I look at you I get a fierce desire to be lonesome

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: Schizophrenia beats dining alone

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I make up my mind, I'm full of indecision

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: Underneath this flabby exterior is an enormous lack of character

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: I've given up reading books. I find it takes my mind off myself

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness isn't something you experience; it's something you remember

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: What the world needs is more geniuses with humility; there are so few of us left

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a study of a man in chaos in search of frenzy

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Curves are the essence of my work because they are the essence of Brazil, pure and simple

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Right angles don't attract me. Nor straight, hard and inflexible lines created by man

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture is invention

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: The artistic capability of reinforced concrete is so fantastic - that is the way to go

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I like talking to priests, to Catholics. Everyone has their beliefs

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: The challenge of a cathedral is very good for architectural inventiveness

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a Brazilian before I am an architect. I cannot separate the two

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I search for surprise in my architecture. A work of art should cause the emotion of newness

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Surprise is key in all art

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: It was the drawing that led me to architecture, the search for light and astonishing forms

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: I like game shows

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: I still use quill and parchment. I do e-mails, and I write, but I don't go around surfing too much

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty much a straight guy on 'The Office.' We can't all be crazies. You need some balance

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved improv. It's my thing

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: I am Cuban, my parents are Cuban, and I was not adopted

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always just been attracted to comedy

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up, I find it really difficult. It's not really my thing

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: Life in California is beautiful

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: Quality attracts quality. People want to be on a good show

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: Ricky Gervais is a genius

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're a basketball player, you've got to shoot

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: Basketball is basketball

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: But I like to think an athlete is an athlete

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think that players learn how to play any other aspect of the game in high school or college

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that basketball players should get the job done no matter how it looks on the screen

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was taught to play that way when I was in high school and even before I got to high school

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, I guess, people want stars. People are trying to invent stars

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: This is where young players today want to land. They want to be NBA players because of the money

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all Americans trying to compete. Magic was competing for his team and Larry for his team

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you play guard, you're not going to block a lot of shots. Inside, you're going to block shots

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: My coaching days are now over, and I'm proud of what I've achieved

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: We always go into a game to win
